segments.text: Can I have my money back on this skirt ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , this is defective . See ? I didn't notice this hole when I bought it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I'm very sorry about that . You can change it for another one if you prefer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you have exactly the same one-same color , same design , and same size , of course .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This one is the same size and color . But the design is different .
segments.speaker: S2
